Description:
Detects potential process patterns related to Cobalt Strike beacon activity

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential CobaltStrike Process Patterns
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%cmd.exe /c whoami' and parent_process_path like 'c:\temp\%') or ((parent_process_path like '%\runonce.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\dllhost.exe') and (command like '%cmd.exe /c echo%' and command like '%> \\\\.\\pipe%')) or ((parent_command_line like '%cmd.exe /c echo%' and parent_command_line like '% > \\\\.\\pipe%') and command like '%conhost.exe 0xffffffff -forcev1') or (parent_command_line like '%/c whoami' and command like '%conhost.exe 0xffffffff -forcev1'))
